TopicTitle: (WIP) (KSP 1.11x) Xamion a planet far beyond Eeloo

Articles.Content:
EVE aurorae ^

 

All four moons visible

Ariel aurorae + xamion aurorae


Ok so this is the release thread of my very first mod . I have put in 4 moons and one planet, very far. 
It has texture like the stock terrain shader
Downloads  

SPACEDOCK DOWNLOAD

Here are some mods that can get you to Xamion :

 

Quote

ChangeLog :

Release 0.1 : First Release

Release 0.15 : Update to map size 

Release 0.154 : MAJOR Code fixes

Release 0.155 : Description fixes

Release 0.156 : Fixed kerbol escape bug, Increased orbit size

Release 0.2 : Minor moon orbit color fix 

Release 0.3 : This is The BIGGEST UPDATE since the release of this mod This is supposed to make the terrain and map view of the planets much better. 

Release 0.35 : Bug fixed from version 0.3

Release 0.5 : 5 Bug fixes, Added rings to Xamion, Heavy Optimization

Release 0.6 : Fixed Ring Radius and Outer radius

Release 0.7 : Better maps for Vagroth, Rostea, Ariel

Release 0.8 : Biggest release yet : Better maps for ALL bodies, Config fixes, EVE aurorae, bug fixes, HEAVY optimization.

Release 0.85 : New textures for all moons

Release 0.9 : Terrain Textures of all planets are now new

Creative Commons License  

 

Edited May 26, 2021 by Weak Player
First Release Out!
Congrats on the release!!

This mod needs fixed. For me it causes a game breaking bug which causes all spacecraft to fly out of the solar system.

Pity i was looking forward to exploring this planet.

Another issue is that two of the moons are appearing INSIDE the planet. You need to correct their orbital radius.

So, i downloaded the latest version of your mod and tried to give it another go. Previously, I had another planet mod installed so i thought maybe it was causing a conflict. Deleting it didn't help. 
However the other planet mod causes no problems when i remove your mod.
When your mod is installed, and i try to leave Kerbal sphere of influence, say for example to try to get to Duna, this is what happens
https://imgur.com/BbOS4Xd


Also a couple of more minor problems you might want to correct for your next update
1- I don't know if its a bug or a feature, but the orbit colour of Lumia is black. This makes it very hard to see.
2- On the Observatory descriptions, all the moons have the same information descriptions as Ariel.
